synopsis.text: Tragedy strikes the Asakura family, leading to a heart-wrenching loss that leaves Junichi devastated and struggling to cope. A year later, with the unwavering support of his friends, especially Kotori Shirakawa, Junichi finds the strength to move forward. In this two-episode OVA, witness an alternate retelling of the beloved Da Capo series, exploring the 'what if' scenario where Junichi reciprocates Kotori's feelings. However, as the couple attempts to navigate their newfound relationship, they grapple with the challenges of expressing their emotions amidst the lingering confusion and grief from Junichi's recent loss, which includes the mysterious passing of his sister, Nemu, who may have held a special place in his heart.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
